name: The Tower of Druaga
description: You control a heroic knight, who is actually prince Gilgamesh, who must attempt to rescue the maiden from the demon Druaga. You are armed with a sword and shield to attack and defend.You move from floor to floor, which are constructed as mazes, searching for the key; this key will unlock the stage exit.Items can be found by killing (all) enemies.
